attributes.action: Decriminalise and tax cannabis to help fund the shortfall in the budget.
attributes.additional_details: The prohibition has failed, you can easily get cannabis in every city in the UK and the government is losing millions in potential tax revenue.
attributes.background:
Tap in to the black market to fund future spending.
The prohibition has failed, you can easily get cannabis in every city in the UK and the government is losing millions in potential tax revenue.
